ygData.subject: Re: magical 2h-slashing
ygData.msgSnippet: The Blackened iron bastard sword is way better then the BBC though, and in my opinion easier to get... As long as your lvl 24 plus, with a party.. Wes Lobdell,
ygData.messageBody:
The Blackened iron bastard sword is way better then the BBC though, and in my opinion easier to get... As long as your lvl 24 plus, with a party..

Wes Lobdell,
Quote: +ACI-I don't want to achieve immortality through my work. I want to achieve
it through not dying.+ACI-
-Woody Allen
------------------------
My all time favorite Oxymorons:
exact estimate, plastic silverware, genuine imitation, mud bath, original copy, student teacher, alone together, anarchy rules, bitter sweet, bankrupt millionaire, black light, butt-head, casual sex, clean dirt, coed sorority, cold as hell, computer jock, constant change, cowardly lion, curved line(according to the mathematical definition of a line), delibrate mistake, dry wine, earth angel(ok thats just going back a ways +ADs-), educational television, even odds, found missing, freezer burn, fresh cheese, full-length bikini, half full, half naked, hard water, hells angels, idiot savant, jumbo shrimp, less is more, and finally my all time FAVORITE OXYMORON....: 'Microsoft works'+ACEAIQAhACEAIQAh-
-----Original Message-----
From: Whitcraft,David DWHITCRAFT+AEA-cerner.com
To: 'EQCheats+AEA-onelist.com' EQCheats+AEA-onelist.com
Date: Tuesday, July 27, 1999 5:13 PM
Subject: RE: +AFs-EQCheats+AF0- magical 2h-slashing


From: +ACI-Whitcraft,David+ACI- DWHITCRAFT+AEA-cerner.com

Lota of 2H Slashing magics out there. Go to EQ'Lizer for a good list
(http://gameznet.com/eq/). Bone Bladed Claymore is a very common wanted 2H
slashing. I sold one I got in Befallen for 350pp, but this was about a month
and a half ago. I imagine they go for about half this or less now, although
I'm not sure.

Need to be about 16-20th level, in a party to get this item, and be prepared
to camp for hours on end. My party camped the lower level of Befallen all
day (12 hours) and we got 2 BBCs that day. Hrm...might have been 3.

-----Original Message-----
